title: EP 86: Bangin In Dallas
itunes:title: EP 86: Bangin In Dallas
description:
In this episode we give a quick run down on how the Crip's and Blood's migrated to the Mid-West and the South during the eighties coke rush. We then tap in with the Dallas/Fort Worth homies Charleston Blue, Ft. Worth 52 Hoover OG Percy and Anthony Dewberry from W .Dallas Rollin 60 to discuss how Dallas became so steeped in L.A. gang culture

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
